biotools.summary: PromoterCAD is a web server for designing synthetic promoters in plants with altered transcriptional regulation. PromoterCAD uses published high-throughput expression and motif data from Arabidopsis thaliana to guide DNA design.

bioschemas.name: PromoterCAD
